Furthermore, ESRS S1 paragraph AR 55, Table 3 and Table 4 provide the relevant tables to present
this information in (Table 3: ‘Template for presenting information on employees by contract type,
broken down by gender (head count or FTE)’; and Table 4: ‘Template for presenting information
on employees by contract type, broken down by region (head count or FTE)’).
